src:
Hobi Buruk Liverpool: Buat Susah Diri Sendiri
03 Nov 2019, 02:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah komentar dibuat Jurgen Klopp paska timnya mengalahkan Aston Villa. Klopp mengakui bahwa timnya tidak tampil dengan optimal di laga itu, sehingga mereka nyaris pulang tanpa poin.
Liverpool mendapatkan kejutan saat mengunjungi Villa Park tadi malam. Mereka tertinggal terlebih dahulu oleh gol Mahmoud Trezeguet.
Meski tertinggal, Liverpool tidak menyerah begitu saja. Mereka terus menggempur pertahanan tuan rumah sebelum akhirnya mereka membobol gawang Tom Heaton berkat aksi Andrew Robertson dan Sadio Mane.
Klopp mengakui bahwa timnya tampil dengan kurang apik di laga tersebut. "Kami membuat segalanya menjadi sulit untuk diri kami," beber Klopp yang dikutip Liverpool Echo.

Baca komentar lengkap sang pelatih di bawah ini.
text:
Liverpool's Bad Hobbies: Make Yourself Difficult
Nov 3 2019, 2:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A comment made by Jurgen Klopp after his team defeated Aston Villa. Klopp admitted that his team did not perform optimally in the match, so they almost went home without points.
Liverpool got a surprise when visiting Villa Park last night. They were left behind by Mahmoud Trezeguet's goal.
Although left behind, Liverpool did not just give up. They continued to storm the defense of the host before finally breaking into Tom Heaton's goal thanks to the actions of Andrew Robertson and Sadio Mane.
Klopp admitted that his team performed poorly in the match. "We make things difficult for ourselves," Klopp was quoted as saying by Liverpool Echo.

Read the trainer's full comment below.
